name: Tic Tac Toe Enemy AI
description: Through out the year of 2019 I plan to release a game once per week. For week two I decided to build an enemy AI for a game of Tic Tac Toe. I ended up fully scripting out the behavior of the AI. It will always make the optimal moves and is nails hard.  You can learn more about the development process and the challenge that I am doing this year over at my YouTube channel.  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuI9aqy-pdD8H0Cz1dUCe0Q
